title: Create and Submit Export Shipments (EEI Filing)
description: Allows users to create new export shipment declarations (Electronic Export Information - EEI) with all mandatory commodity data and transmit them electronically to the CBP AES system.
functionality: Input shipment header information (parties, transport details, dates).
Input commodity line item details (description, tariff number, quantities, values, units of measure, ECCN, EIC, origin).
Support shipments with single or multiple commodity lines.
Handle commodities requiring two units of measure.
Transmit shipment data to AES in the specified format (e.g., ABI).
benefits: Ensures compliance with US export reporting regulations.
Provides a standardized electronic method for submitting EEI.
Facilitates the core process of declaring exports.
